verses.verse: The Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> with the Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> came, <S%G4334><s%> and tempting <S%G3985><s%> desired <S%G1905><s%> him that he would show <S%G1925><s%> them a sign <S%G4592><s%> from heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

He answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, When it is evening, <S%G3798><s%> you say, <S%G3004><s%> It will be fair <S%G2105><s%> weather: <S%G2105><s%> for the sky <S%G3772><s%> is red. <S%G4449><s%>

And in the morning, <S%G4404><s%> It will be foul <S%G5494><s%> weather <S%G5494><s%> to day: <S%G4594><s%> for the sky <S%G3772><s%> is red <S%G4449><s%> and lowering. <S%G4768><s%> O you hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> you can <S%G1097><s%> discern <S%G1252><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of the sky; <S%G3772><s%> but can <S%G1410><s%> you not discern the signs <S%G4592><s%> of the times? <S%G2540><s%>

A wicked <S%G4190><s%> and adulterous <S%G3428><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> seeks <S%G1934><s%> after <S%G1934><s%> a sign; <S%G4592><s%> and there shall no <S%G3756><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> be given <S%G1325><s%> to it, but the sign <S%G4592><s%> of the prophet <S%G4396><s%> Jonas. <S%G2495><s%> And he left <S%G2641><s%> them, and departed. <S%G565><s%>
And when his disciples <S%G3101><s%> were come <S%G2064><s%> to the other <S%G4008><s%> side, <S%G4008><s%> they had forgotten <S%G1950><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Take heed <S%G3708><s%> and beware <S%G4337><s%> of the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and of the Sadducees. <S%G4523><s%>
And they reasoned <S%G1260><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> It is because <S%G3754><s%> we have taken <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

Which when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> perceived, <S%G1097><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, O you of little <S%G3640><s%> faith, <S%G3640><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> reason <S%G1260><s%> you among <S%G1722><s%> yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you have brought <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread? <S%G740><s%>

Do you not yet <S%G3768><s%> understand, <S%G3539><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> remember <S%G3421><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> of the five <S%G4000><s%> thousand, <S%G4000><s%> and how <S%G4214><s%> many <S%G4214><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> you took <S%G2983><s%> up?

Neither <S%G3761><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> of the four <S%G5070><s%> thousand, <S%G5070><s%> and how <S%G4214><s%> many <S%G4214><s%> baskets <S%G4711><s%> you took <S%G2983><s%> up?

How <S%G4459><s%> is it that you do not understand <S%G3539><s%> that I spoke <S%G2036><s%> it not to you concerning <S%G4012><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> that you should beware <S%G4337><s%> of the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and of the Sadducees? <S%G4523><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> understood <S%G4920><s%> they how that he bade <S%G2036><s%> them not beware <S%G4337><s%> of the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of bread, <S%G740><s%> but of the doctrine <S%G1322><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and of the Sadducees. <S%G4523><s%>

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the coasts <S%G3313><s%> of Caesarea <S%G2542><s%> Philippi, <S%G5375><s%> he asked <S%G2065><s%> his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> do men <S%G444><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> that I the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> am? <S%G1511><s%>

And they said, <S%G2036><s%> Some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3033><s%> say that you are John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist: <S%G910><s%> some, <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3033><s%> Elias; <S%G2243><s%> and others, <S%G2087><s%> Jeremias, <S%G2408><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>
He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, But whom <S%G5101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> you that I am? <S%G1511><s%>

And Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> You are <S%G1488><s%> the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> you, Simon <S%G4613><s%> Barjona: <S%G920><s%> for flesh <S%G4561><s%> and blood <S%G129><s%> has not revealed <S%G601><s%> it to you, but my Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And I say <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G1161><s%> to you, That you are <S%G1488><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and on this <S%G5026><s%> rock <S%G4073><s%> I will build <S%G3618><s%> my church; <S%G1577><s%> and the gates <S%G4439><s%> of hell <S%G86><s%> shall not prevail <S%G2729><s%> against <S%G2729><s%> it.

And I will give <S%G1325><s%> to you the keys <S%G2807><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven: <S%G3772><s%> and whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1487><s%> you shall bind <S%G1210><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> shall be bound <S%G1210><s%> in heaven: <S%G3772><s%> and whatever <S%G1487><s%> you shall loose <S%G3089><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> shall be loosed <S%G3089><s%> in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> charged <S%G1291><s%> he his disciples <S%G3101><s%> that they should tell <S%G2036><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> that he was Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

From that time <S%G5119><s%> forth began <S%G756><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to show <S%G1166><s%> to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> how that he must <S%G1163><s%> go <S%G565><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and suffer <S%G3958><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things of the elders <S%G4245><s%> and chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and be killed, <S%G615><s%> and be raised <S%G1453><s%> again <S%G1453><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

Then <S%G2532><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> took <S%G4355><s%> him, and began <S%G756><s%> to rebuke <S%G2008><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Be it far <S%G2436><s%> from you, Lord: <S%G2962><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> shall not be to you.

But he turned, <S%G4762><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Get <S%G5217><s%> you behind <S%G3694><s%> me, Satan: <S%G4567><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> an offense <S%G4625><s%> to me: for you mind <S%G5426><s%> not the things that be of God, <S%G2316><s%> but those <S%G3588><s%> that be of men. <S%G444><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man will <S%G2309><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me, let him deny <S%G533><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and take <S%G142><s%> up his cross, <S%G4716><s%> and follow <S%G190><s%> me.

For whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> it: and whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> will lose <S%G622><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> for my sake <S%G1752><s%> shall find <S%G2147><s%> it.

For what <S%G5101><s%> is a man <S%G444><s%> profited, <S%G5623><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he shall gain <S%G2770><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> and lose <S%G2210><s%> his own soul? <S%G5590><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall a man <S%G444><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> in exchange <S%G465><s%> for his soul? <S%G5590><s%>

For the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%> in the glory <S%G1391><s%> of his Father <S%G3962><s%> with his angels; <S%G32><s%> and then <S%G5119><s%> he shall reward <S%G591><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> man according <S%G2596><s%> to his works. <S%G4234><s%>

Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, There be some <S%G5100><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> here, <S%G5602><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> shall not taste <S%G1089><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> they see <S%G1492><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> in his kingdom. <S%G932><s%>
